title: General
content:
General

State Regulations
§ 1220.10 - Permission to use terminal conditional
§ 1220.11 - Use of terminal may be denied persons violating law or rules
§ 1220.12 - Permission required to enter areas closed to public
§ 1220.13 - Abandonment of property prohibited
§ 1220.14 - Permission required to carry on commercial activity
§ 1220.15 - Gambling prohibited
§ 1220.16 - Permission required to solicit funds or contributions
§ 1220.17 - Permission required to post or distribute commercial signs, advertisements, etc
§ 1220.18 - Lost articles
§ 1220.19 - Trash, garbage, waste, etc. to be deposited in receptacles provided therefor
§ 1220.20 - Defacing, damaging, etc. terminal or property therein prohibited
§ 1220.21 - Noncommercial distribution of leaflets, carrying of placards and holding of discussions restricted
§ 1220.22 - Creation of obnoxious odors, noxious gases, smoke or fumes prohibited
§ 1220.23 - Vehicular use of terminal restricted
§ 1220.24 - Loitering in or about terminal prohibited
§ 1220.25 - Authorization required for sale of merchandise, solicitation of trade, entertainment of persons or solicitation of alms
§ 1220.26 - Persons unable to give satisfactory explanation of presence prohibited from loitering in terminal
§ 1220.27 - Animals barred from vehicular levels; exceptions
§ 1220.28 - Passage through loading gates on lowest vehicular level restricted

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
